name: Creation of an Executable by an Executable
description: Detects the creation of an executable by another executable
query: ((process.executable:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Cc][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Xx][Gg][Ii][Aa][Dd][Aa][Pp][Tt][Ee][Rr][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Cc][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ii][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ii][Bb][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll]\\.*/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Xx][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/) OR file.path:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/)) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\.*/) OR (file.path:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*.exe AND file.path:*.exe) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe OR C\:\\Windows\\system32\\cleanmgr.exe OR C\:\\Windows\\explorer.exe OR C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\dxgiadaptercache.exe OR C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\Dism.exe OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wuauclt.exe)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe AND file.path:C\:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\Download\\Install\\*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*) OR file.path:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\*) OR (file.path:*\\Microsoft\\WindowsApps\\*))))`
